AppName: iTube Pro - Playlist Manager for Youtube
Description:
Use YouTube as music player: 
- Play on background 
- Find lyrics to videos 
- Set a sleep timer 
- Make Playlists 
- Enjoy Dynamic TOP 100 Playlists = changes every day. 
- View history of watched videos and make favorites list 
- Login with YouTube and play & edit your playlists 
- Publish on Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter, email or SMS. 
- Display media info on lock screen 
- Search Playlists and Channels and copy them immediately to be yours. 
- Skip songs with headphones or iPod controls 
Need to say more? 

Also: 
- Double Tap on video to zoom in and out, one tap to dismiss controls. 
- Scroll player controls to the left to see sleep timer, rotation lock and more.

AppName: Video Downloader - Download & Play Any Video
Description:
* Download & Play All Your Favorite Videos! 
* Create Hot Video Collections On The Go! 
* Password Protect Your Private Videos! 

"Best Video Solution for iOS" - Top10Apps 
"5 Star Video Downloader" - iPhoneWorlds 

With a help of our app you can download and watch any video on your i-Device. No need to convert videos! You can also transfer videos to or from your computer or use Air-Play to watch videos on your TV or flatscreen. 

Supported video formats: 

- (NEW!) m3u8 streams
- Flv (Flash Video), wmv , mpeg, mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4, 3gp, sf, avi, divx, dv, gxf, m2p, m2ts, m2v, m4v, mkv(non-hd), moov, mov, mp4, mpg, mpv, mt2s, mts, mxf, ogm, ogv, ps, qt, ts, vob, webm, wm. 

*HD Videos are not supported. 
**Flash videos can be played only after you download them. App can not play streaming flash videos from the web. 

App Key Features: 

√ Full iPhone 5 Support 

√ Web browser: 

- Built-in Ad Blocker
- Built-in Web Password Manager
- Provides a user experience very similar to Mobile Safari 
- Tap and hold to force download 
- Bookmark manager 
- Ability to spoof browser's user-agent (iPhone, iPad, FireFox) 

√ Download manager: 

- Ultra fast downloading speed 
- Up to 10 simultaneous downloads 
- Download in background mode (limited to 10 min by iOS) 
- Supports resuming of interrupted downloads 
- Download files larger 20MB over 3G 

√ Video player: 

- Background video playback
- Video Playlists 
- Play almost any video format without conversion 
- Play folders as playlists 
- Shuffle / Repeat 
- Portrait/landscape mode 
- Play sound from videos in background/lock mode 
- Air-play support 

√ File manager: 

- Video thumbnails 
- Folders and sub-folders support 
- Move, rename and delete files 
- Sort files by name, type, size, date 

√ Lock your videos with password
